channel.title: Umbra 317 | 24/7 | 2x EXP Every Weekend | Bossing | Pking | Economy | Join Now!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xzYDqnj.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][URL=http://"http://umbra317.com/"]Home[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://umbra317.com/forums/index.php/"]Forums[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://umbra317.com/webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.umbra317.com/playnow.html"]Play Now[/URL][/SIZE]
What is Umbra?
Umbra a new server which strives to create amazing content, have a great economy, boast a friendly community, and have the hardest working staff team around.
We want to create an enviroment where the player's are the source of everything. All updates are geared towards making the server more enjoyable for the community.
We take pride in our economy. All item prices are chosen by supply and demand from the players. We will never interfere with the economy.
Our goal here at Umbra is to have an enjoyable server with a friendly player-base. We want players to enjoy the content and the company of other players online.
We also have an active staff team who is always working extremely hard to ensure Umbra is always the best.
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/egv5uw.png[/img] [spoiler=Server Features] Castle Wars Pest Control Barrows Barbarian Assault Awesome Economy Great Community Active Community Forums Social Slayer Improved Item Switching Frequent Updates Dedicated Staff Members A plethora of bosses to fight Small Cache Size 100% Clanchat Tons of quests, soon to be added And much more, come login and see. [/spoiler]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/6z8qig.png[/img] [SPOILER=Some images of the server] [img]http://i.imgur.com/06fxF4v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/c8ixRxI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VEcNJDZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tkHupNl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Rp2Kpyc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IRjnuDh.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mABj49U.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/n0zJLru.png[/img]

What is Umbra?

Umbra a new server which strives to create amazing content, have a great economy, boast a friendly community, and have the hardest working staff team around.

We want to create an enviroment where the player’s are the source of everything. All updates are geared towards making the server more enjoyable for the community.

We take pride in our economy. All item prices are chosen by supply and demand from the players. We will never interfere with the economy.

Our goal here at Umbra is to have an enjoyable server with a friendly player-base. We want players to enjoy the content and the company of other players online.

We also have an active staff team who is always working extremely hard to ensure Umbra is always the best.


[spoiler=Server Features]
